QuestData.Title: A Tempered Blade
QuestData.Description:
These blades that I wield are newly forged. The time has come to temper them in the blood of my enemies.
I have heard that you are skilled in the ways of battle. I too am proficient in the business of death and I would be honored to fight at your side.
Accompany me, $c, and together we will spill the blood of our enemies.
